name: Outrider

skills.name: Bodkin
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Fire Arrow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases enemy MAX HP by 15% of damage dealt.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Salvo
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
